text: 'iidha alshams luffat wadhahab daw'uha, wa'iidha alnujum tnathrt, fdhhb nwrha, wa'iidha aljibal syirt ean wajah al'ard fsart hba'an mnbthana, wa'iidha alnwq alhwaml turkt wahmlt, wa'iidha alhayawanat alwahshiat jumet wakhtltt; lyqtss allah min bedha lbed, wa'iidha albihar awqdt, fsart ealaa eizamha narana ttwqd, wa'iidha alnufus qurnt bamthalha wnzayrha, wa'iidha altflt almdfwnt hayatan suylt yawm alqiamat swal ttyyb laha wtbkyt lwaydha: bay dhanb kan dfnha? wa'iidha suhuf al'aemal eurdt, wa'iidha alsama' qulet wazylt min mkanha, wa'iidha alnaar awqdt fadrimt, wa'iidha aljanat dar alnaeim qurribt min 'ahliha almtqyn, 'iidha waqae dhlk, tyqnt wwjdt kll nafs maa qddamt min khayr 'aw shr
